org.energy_home.jemma.javagal.layers.business
Class GalController

java.lang.Object
  org.energy_home.jemma.javagal.layers.business.GalController

public class GalController
extends java.lang.Object

JavaGal Controller. Only one instance of this object can exists at a time. All clients can access this instance via their dedicated proxies (see GalExtenderProxy).

Author:
"Ing. Marco Nieddu marco.nieddu@consoft.it or marco.niedducv@gmail.com from Consoft Sistemi S.P.A., financed by EIT ICT Labs activity SecSES - Secure Energy Systems (activity id 13030)"

configureEndpoint

public short configureEndpoint(long timeout,
                               org.energy_home.jemma.zgd.jaxb.SimpleDescriptor desc)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.Exception,
                               org.energy_home.jemma.zgd.GatewayException
Allows the creation of an endpoint to which is associated a SimpleDescriptor. The operation is synchronous and lasts for a maximum timeout time.

Parameters:
timeout - the desired timeout.
desc - the SimpleDescriptor.
Returns:
a short representing the endpoint.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an Input Output error occurs.
java.lang.Exception - if a general error occurs.
org.energy_home.jemma.zgd.GatewayException - if a ZGD error occurs.
